Podcast: Tesla battery day delay, Tesla Cybertruck, Full Self-Driving, and more
This week on the Electrek Podcast, we discuss the most popular news in the world of sustainable transport and energy, including Tesla ‘battery day’ being delay, Tesla Cybertruck new, Full Self-Driving news, and more. Man creates hilarious AI version of himself to take his spot during Zoom calls

Now, the fake version of himself is able to stand-in on Zoom calls and even respond to programed questions like "How are you?" and "Did you get that?" The only problem is it's very clear the Zoombot is a bot.
